iti15:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti15:2.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single fetter, fettered by which people wander and transmigrate for a long time like the fetter of craving.
iti15:2.2: Fettered by craving, people wander and transmigrate for a long time.”
iti15:2.3: That is what the Buddha said.
iti15:3.2: as they transmigrate on this long journey.
iti15:3.3: They go from this state to another,
iti15:4.2: that craving is the cause of suffering—
iti15:4.3: rid of craving, free of grasping,
iti15:5.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
